pages.text: $(li)The Cold Ocean is a variant of the Ocean biome that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place is composed mainly by Gravel blocks.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass and Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic creatures survives in this cold waters, like Orcas, Cachalot Whales, Salmons, Cods and Squids.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Cold Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
